product_name: Continental Ultra Gatorskin Bike Tire - 26 x 1-1/8
long_description: The Ultra Gatorskin tire is durable and rugged and is great for both commuting and touring with weight. Durable carbon black compound gives good puncture protection and Duraskin mesh sidewall fabric protects the casing from cuts, punctures and abrasion. Duraskin mesh sidewall fabric is applied to only the exposed sidewall area to save weight; adds a high-tech look to this tire.
short_description: The Ultra Gatorskin tire is durable and rugged and is great for both commuting and touring with weight.
